texto: Production and service processes may need to be checked, to ensure they are capable of delivering the required output; such a check should always be undertaken if the output of a process cannot be verified by subsequent monitoring or measurement. The quality plan should identify the inputs, realization activities and outputs required for carrying out production and/or service delivery.
